subSections.title: Pronunciation 2
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=bàng,bèng
|m_note=bàng - mainland China; bèng - Taiwan <!-- Compare 漢語大字典 (China) and Moedict.tw (Taiwan) -->
|c=pong3,bong3
|mc=3
|oc=y,n
|ma=
|cat=n,v
}}

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# boat [[oar]]; [[boat]]
# to [[row]]
#: {{zh-x|榜{bàng/bèng} 舟|to [[row]]}}
#: {{zh-alt-inline|搒}} <!-- Similar compounds found under 搒 in 《漢語大詞典》 -->
# to [[beat up]] a person <!-- 漢語大字典 (China) and Moedict.tw (Taiwan) gives this definition. See also pronunciation 3 -->
# {{zh-alt-form|傍}} <!-- 漢語大字典 -->
